Question
========

On what scale of measurement are times of the day measured on?

Answerlist
----------

* nominal
* ordinal
* interval
* ratio

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* nominal: Incorrect
* ordinal: Incorrect
* interval: Incorrect
* ratio: Correct
